resume_text:
NAME: Diana Garcia
EMAIL: diana.garcia@email.com
PHONE: 555-111-2222

SUMMARY:
DevOps Engineer with a strong focus on automation and infrastructure as code. Proficient in AWS, Docker, and Kubernetes.

SKILLS:
AWS, Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform, Ansible, Git, Jenkins

EXPERIENCE:
Cloud Solutions - DevOps Engineer (2020 - Present)
- Automated infrastructure provisioning and deployment using Terraform.
- Managed containerized applications using Docker and Kubernetes on AWS.

IT Services - Systems Administrator (2018 - 2020)
- Maintained and monitored Linux servers.
- Implemented automation scripts using Ansible.

EDUCATION:
University of Texas at Austin - Bachelor's in Computer Engineering (2018)
